content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_banner
inventory=[{"type": "poisonous_potato", "quantity": 54, "index": 11}, {"type": "gray_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 13}, {"type": "music_disc_13", "quantity": 1, "index": 19}, {"type": "light_gray_carpet", "quantity": 52, "index": 22}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 20, "index": 26}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft a gray_banner, I need to place 6 gray_wool in the crafting grid in a 2x3 pattern. I will move the first wool to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1
